Class CompetitorList

java.lang.Object
CompetitorList
public class CompetitorList extends Object
This class contains the list of competitors

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CompetitorList()
    In the constructor the competitor details is read from the file and added to the competitor list
